description: This table stores information related to a radiation-therapy episode, such as the goal and treatment technique. This is a no-add table.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode of care record.

columns.name: RAD_THERAPY_TREAT_TECHNIQUE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The treatment technique for radiation therapy.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


2D


3D CRT


IMRT


IGRT


SBRT


SRS


SRT


Proton Beam


DXT


SXT


Electron Beam


Brachytherapy


LDR


HDR


Irregular Surface


VMAT


IORT


TBI


HDR


LDR


SXT


SRT


Other


TBI

columns.name: RAD_THERAPY_TREATMENT_GOAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The radiation therapy treatment goal.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Control


Curative


Maintenance


Palliative


Supportive


Prophylactic


Benign


Consolidative


Definitive

columns.name: RAD_THERAPY_PLANNED_START_DATE
columns.description: The planned start date for radiation therapy.
